function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher residential building density relates to a lower DCR in all phases.","Impact":"Higher density may lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, promote ventilation and air quality.","Technologies":"Building management systems for air quality monitoring, UVGI systems for air disinfection.","People":"Residents, visitors, building staff.","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Higher building-level crowding relates to a higher DCR in P3-P5.","Impact":"Increased crowding may lead to easier transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Limit occupancy, stagger building usage, promote social distancing.","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, contactless access control systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors.","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities."},{"Description":"PT commute time positively correlates with DCR in P3.","Impact":"Longer commute times may lead to increased risk of disease transmission during travel.","Mitigation":"Improve public transportation efficiency, promote ventilation and air quality in transit.","Technologies":"Real-time transit tracking systems, air filtration systems in public transport.","People":"Public transit users.","Owner":"Transportation authorities, public health authorities."}]}
